Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Hori with painted detail; a black lappet-wig, a modelled face with black features, a black and collar, crossed arms in relief outlined in black holding black hoes, the front of the leg-section is inscribed with black painted hieroglyphs, the back is decorated with a representation of a black seed-basket.
Condition: fair - broken and repaired at waist
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: SLAntiq (number still to be ascertained)
